alert.note: Alert for Imperial (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 12:32PM PDT until October 15 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM PDT FOR WEST CENTRAL IMPERIAL COUNTY... At 1232 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Westmorland, or 10 miles west of Brawley, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Imperial County. This includes the following highways... CA Route 78 between mile markers 11 and 13. CA Route 86 between mile markers 31 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
